text: John Mahaffy (July 18, 1918 - May 2, 2015) was a Canadian professional ice hockey centre. He played 37 games in the National Hockey League for the New York Rangers and Montreal Canadiens. Mahaffy was born in Montreal, Quebec. He was married to Angie PÃ©loquin.
